**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T16:02:03Z" title="05/13/2015 04:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by Emilio**
If I have time this weekend, I might have a go at it.

Does the cap come off when deployed kind of like the parachute? The cap is on in this screenshot, but I\'m assuming once deployed it\'ll blow off and look like the cables are going into the hollow that the sail came from. 

![Untitled-3-1.jpg](http://i855.photobucket.com/albums/ab118/Leon_Walras/Untitled-3-1.jpg)

Texture is rough and dirty placeholder, so if anyone wants to do a better job that\'s cool.

[Dropbox](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/63131765/parasail.zip)

(deleted post)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T16:02:12Z" title="05/13/2015 04:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by Emilio**
A little question : what is the cables lenght ?
It\'s about 2 metres bewteen the canopy and the base, but the cables are longer than that because they are angled. The front one is about 2.5m and the back ones 2.75m.
